title: How valid is the online master’s- courses from Coursera? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not clear what you mean by ‘valid’. These are obviously certificates from real universities. If you mean what their acceptance in the industry is, that is altogether a different question. The courses will make sure you learn, so you will end up knowing the subject for real, and hence the really good companies will appreciate it. HTH
It is some what valid. It just like adding a tag to your resume. but the goal of these courses is to learn the skills. Most companies take you in has long as you know the tech.
